channel.title: Minecraft
channel.description: Is it possible to play the beta mutiplayer on Minecraft with a free client? I got a client from here on MoparCraft forums from CoonHunter's topic. Would that work? Would any free clients work?

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Nonamee, post:9, topic:415070”]I want to play other servers too.[/quote]Buy a premium account then…

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft

item.description:

Nonamee:

I want to play other servers too.

buy minecraft and stop complaining then

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Nonamee:

I want to play other servers too.

You have to find a server that has offline mode set.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Set server.properties online-mode = false

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

badger41:

its because the server is in online mode meaning is has user authentication, cracked clients only work on servers that are in offline mode, meaning any user can connect

Exactly, my launcher only permits you to play single player without fail. Trying to get on multiplayer is almost a guessing game.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

its because the server is in online mode meaning is has user authentication, cracked clients only work on servers that are in offline mode, meaning any user can connect

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

[quote=“noobicus, post:4, topic:415070”][quote author=Nonamee link=topic=517029.msg3754832#msg3754832 date=1316365552]

Is it possible to play the beta mutiplayer on Minecraft with a free client? I got a client from here on MoparCraft forums from CoonHunter’s topic. Would that work? Would any free clients work?

Yep coons client works

It says “User not premium” when I try to connect.
[/quote]
doesnt it let you just continue?[/quote]

Here’s what happened with my server i tried making. Also, I tried joining another server, got the same thing.

And about the letting me continue, it doesn’t let me. It says “Back to title screen”.

Read full topic
